dropoff_days.label: Drop-off days
dropoff_days.comment:
<script type="text/javascript">
                                    /* Set by default all checkboxes. In javascript because magento does not support default on multi select checkboxes. */
                                    if(
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_1').checked == false &&
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_2').checked == false &&
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_3').checked == false &&
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_4').checked == false &&
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_5').checked == false
                                    ) {

                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_1').checked = true;
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_2').checked = true;
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_3').checked = true;
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_4').checked = true;
                                        $('tig_myparcel_checkout_dropoff_days_5').checked = true;
                                    }
                                    </script>

dropoff_delay.label: Dropoff-delay
dropoff_delay.comment: This options allows the Merchant to set the number of days it takes her to pick, pack and hand in her parcels at PostNL when ordered before the cutoff time. Max is 14.

only_recipient.label: Only deliver to receiver
only_recipient.comment: Deliver the package only at address of the intended recipient

morningdelivery_fee.label: Morning delivery fee
morningdelivery_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

morningdelivery_min_order_enabled.label: Morning delivery minimum order total enabled

morningdelivery_min_order_total.label: Morning delivery minimum order total, incl. BTW
morningdelivery_min_order_total.comment: Morning delivery will not be visible if the subtotal of an order is below this value

eveningdelivery_fee.label: Evening delivery fee
eveningdelivery_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

eveningdelivery_min_order_enabled.label: Evening delivery minimum order total enabled

eveningdelivery_min_order_total.label: Evening delivery minimum order total, incl. BTW
eveningdelivery_min_order_total.comment: Evening delivery will not be visible if the subtotal of an order is below this value

pickup_fee.label: Pickup fee
pickup_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

pickup_min_order_total.label: Pickup minimum order total, incl. BTW
pickup_min_order_total.comment: Pickup will not be visible if the subtotal of an order is below this value

pickup_express_fee.label: Pickup Express fee
pickup_express_fee.comment: This will be added to the regular shipping price

pickup_express_min_order_enabled.label: Pickup Express minimum order total enabled

pickup_express_min_order_total.label: Pickup Express minimum order total, incl. BTW
pickup_express_min_order_total.comment: Pickup Express will not be visible if the subtotal of an order is below this value

api.label: API settings
api.comment: To get your personal API credentials you should contact MyParcel.

key.label: API Key
key.comment: The API Key given by MyParcel.

active.label: Enable Myparcel Extension
active.comment: Enable or disable the MyParcel module.
active.tooltip: Selecting 'No' will overrule all individual settings.

print_orientation.label: Print Orientation
print_orientation.comment: Select a standard orientation for printing labels.

tracktrace_template.label: Track&Trace email template
tracktrace_template.comment: You can create a new transactional e-mail where the variables {{var tracktrace_url}} and {{var retourlabel_url}} are available. TIP: You can base them on the Order Update template, because {{var order}} is also available.
tracktrace_template.tooltip: Select a transactional e-mail template to send the barcode

myparcel_shipping_methods.label: MyParcel shipping methods
myparcel_shipping_methods.tooltip: Please select the shipping methods that will be considered to be 'MyParcel' by this extension. Orders placed using one of these shipping methods may be processed using the MyParcel extension.

pakjegemak_use_shipment_address.label: Use shipment address for PostNL location
pakjegemak_use_shipment_address.comment: Use shipment address for 'Ophalen op een PostNL locatie'. The customer will see the address on the invoice. Set to 'No' if you are using AfterPay.

ssl_handshake.label: Force unencrypted MyParcel connection
ssl_handshake.comment: By enabling this, you will force connection to the MyParcel platform over unsecured http, rather than https
ssl_handshake.tooltip: In some cases the SSL certification can't be validated, which can lead to problems connection to the MyParcel platform. Only use this if you are aware that all communication to MyParcel will be sent over the unsecure https protocol.

shipment.label: Default Shipment Settings
shipment.comment:
Fill in your preferences for a shipment. These settings will only apply for the mass actions in the order grid. When creating a single shipment, these settings can be changed manually.
These settings will activate based on the order total amount. When shipping outside of the EU you can set default values for customs type and customs goods HS code.

home_address_only.label: Home address only
home_address_only.comment: Shipments will not be delivered at the neighbours, only on house address.

return_if_no_answer.label: Return if no answer
return_if_no_answer.comment: Shipments will not go the a pickup point but will be returned directly after multiple delivery attempts.

insured_250.label: Insured up to € 250
insured_250.comment: For NL shipping only, shipments outside the EU insured default is € 200

insured_500.label: Insured up to € 500
insured_500.comment: For NL shipping only, shipments inside the EU insured default is € 500

customs_type.label: Customs Shipment Type
customs_type.comment: Default shipment type for Cross Domestic shipments

customs_hstariffnr.label: Customs Content HS Code
customs_hstariffnr.comment: Default content type for Cross Domestic products, see http://gebruikstarief.douane.nl

split_street.label: Split street parts
split_street.comment: Select 'no' if you have problems with addresses on the labels
